TopicTitle: Re-entry effects when going to Launch pad

Articles.Content:
No biggy, just wondering anyone experienced this.

Sometimes, when I go from the VAB to the Launchpad to launch a rocket, I can briefly see re-entry effects around the parts. Anyone seen this or knows what causes it?

No biggy, just wondering anyone experienced this.

Sometimes, when I go from the VAB to the Launchpad to launch a rocket, I can briefly see re-entry effects around the parts. Anyone seen this or knows what causes it?

I see it as well, and was also wondering why. Although, I don't see it at launch, only when I revert to launch.
I have it too. It happens when I click 'Launch' from an editor. It normally lasts about 1 second for me.

It's due to how KSP positions items; apparently it gives them a *giant* kick from the world origin to the launch position, so you briefly see incredible G forces and high speed before it's all canceled.

It's due to how KSP positions items; apparently it gives them a *giant* kick from the world origin to the launch position, so you briefly see incredible G forces and high speed before it's all canceled.

So, it's possible to extend solar panels in VAB and loose them on spawning? Gotta try that.

So, it's possible to extend solar panels in VAB and loose them on spawning? Gotta try that.

i never damaged panels or somthing i think physics kiks in after that positioning
OnFixedUpdate won't run, so they won't be damaged, AIUI.
